info.description: A tool that provides a sorted list of the relevent keywords and their traffic statistics based on the multiple search types and conditions as query parameters.
info.title: KeywordsTool

get.description: Retrieves related keywords and their statistical indicators by query parameters. To determine search types and conditions, a user requests data by combining at least one parameter among `pc business ID`, `mobile business ID`, `pc site`, `mobile site`, `keyword hints`, `season`, `event ID` and by using several conditional parameters.

parameters.name: includeHintKeywords
parameters.description: Set `includeHintKeywords` = 1 to selectively fetch the related keywords containing any word in keyword hints, else set `includeHintKeywords` = 0. Therefore, `includeHintKeywords` can be 1 when using keyword hints with `hintKeywords` parameter.

parameters.name: showDetail
parameters.description: Set `showDetail` = 1 to fetch detailed statistic information per each related keyword (monthly query count, monthly average click count, monthly average ctr, competitiveness index, depth explained below) as well as relavent keywords list. For fetching related keywords and monthly query count info only, set `showDetail` = 0.

monthlyPcQcCnt.description: A simple version of the sum of PC query count from 30 days ago until yesterday. If the query count is less than 10, you get "<10". With no data, you get "-".

monthlyMobileQcCnt.description: A simple version of the sum of mobile query count from 30 days ago until yesterday. If the query count is less than 10, you get "<10". With no data, you get "-".

monthlyAvePcClkCnt.description: A monthly average click count of PC for a keyword. Computed as (the sum of PC click count for the last 4 weeks) / (average depth for PC). With no data, you get "-".

monthlyAveMobileClkCnt.description: A monthly average click count of mobile for a keyword. Computed as (the sum of mobile click count for the last 4 weeks) / (average depth for mobile). With no data, you get "-".

monthlyAvePcCtr.description: A click-through rate of PC. Computed as (the sum of PC click count for the last 4 weeks) / (the sum of PC impression count for the last 4 weeks). With no data, you get "-".

monthlyAveMobileCtr.description: A click-through rate of mobile. Computed as (the sum of mobile click count for the last 4 weeks) / (the sum of mobile impression count for the last 4 weeks). With no data, you get "-".

plAvgDepth.description: An average depth of PC. Computed as (the sum of PC impression count for the last 4 weeks) / (the sum of PC 조회수 for the last 4 weeks). With no data, you get "-".

compIdx.description: A competitiveness index. Computed as (an average depth of PC) / (집계시점의 PC 노출가능광고개수). If compIdx < 0.3 then you get "낮음", else if compIdx < 0.7 then you get "중간", and for other cases, you get "높음". With no data, you get "-".
